changes: First-run setup screen: enter your internal API base URL before using the extension
All API endpoints are derived from the configured base URL — nothing hardcoded in source
Config stored in chrome.storage.local; ⚙ Config button in header lets you change it anytime
'Use demo data only' option skips setup for offline/testing use
background.js service worker also reads base URL from storage dynamically
Update banner appears below tabs when a newer version is available with reload instructions
Version badge pulses when an update is detected
Update check throttled to once per hour; result cached in storage to avoid redundant network calls
Dismiss button hides the banner for the current session
Light/dark mode toggle added to the header toolbar
Theme preference persists across sessions via chrome.storage.local
Light theme uses a clean off-white palette with blue accent, optimized for readability
All UI surfaces, tables, modals, and overlays fully themed
Query tab key input now has type-ahead from all loaded key names across all sources
Suggestions update automatically as domains and async data (Plans, Settings) finish loading
New Query tab: search across all loaded domains by key name and/or value
Key conditions: contains / equals
Value conditions: contains / equals / is true / is false / any
Results sorted diffs-first then alphabetically, with diff highlighting
Cells matching the value condition are outlined for quick scanning
Searches all sources: Basic, Features, Advanced, Plans, Add-ons, Settings
Settings section added to Compare table — fetches settings_dashboard API
Nested hierarchy: key_level (DOMAIN/DC/POD/DEFAULT) → prefix group → field rows
Settings section collapsed by default (may contain hundreds of rows)
Settings filter pill added to Compare toolbar
Search auto-expands and highlights within nested settings rows
401 errors now show 'Not logged in' warning instead of 'Domain not found'
Login flash message uses amber styling and stays visible for 6 seconds
HTTP status code passed through from background service worker for accurate error classification
Show Keys toggle: display backend field keys inline below human-readable labels
Search highlights backend key matches when Show Keys is active
Show Keys applies to both Compare and Domain Versions tables
Differences Only replaced with independent toggle on Compare and Domain Versions tabs
Diff badges and global count hidden during field search to avoid confusion
Dynamic export filename: EgnyteYodaCompare-[domains].csv
Release notes modal powered by changelog.json
Fixed race condition causing valid domains to show 'Domain not found' error
Restored missing ensurePlansData function
Removed ~400 lines of dead Plans card/matrix CSS
Plans & Add-ons integrated as sections in the Compare table
New Plans and Add-ons filter pills in compare toolbar
Cross-domain plan comparison with diff highlighting
Dark terminal UI with IBM Plex fonts
Accordion sections, live field search, version tracking
Bulk import, CSV export, full-tab mode
